text:
Arnol Kox (11 October 1952 – 15 July 2020) was a Dutch street preacher. He was born in Bergeijk, Netherlands. For at least 40 years he loudly talked about God's word in the center of Eindhoven. He talked to citizens and tourists directly with incentive things and religious messages.
Kox died at the hospital in Eindhoven, Netherlands on 15 July 2020 from leukaemia-related problems, aged 67.
